zh: 汤姆已经决定戒烟了。

en: "Just close your eyes," whispered Tom, and when Mary closed her eyes, he kissed her softly on the lips.
zh: “闭上眼睛，”汤姆小声说道，当玛丽闭上眼睛时，他轻轻吻了她的双唇。

en: Italy's country code is 39.
zh: 意大利的国际区号是39。

en: Tom Miller, one of several promising young composers, is gathering a lot of attention.
zh: 汤姆·米勒是几位大有前途的年轻作曲家之一，正备受关注。

en: That handbag is mine.
zh: 那个手提包是我的。

en: Is that what Tom would really want?
zh: 那真的是汤姆想要的吗？

en: Mary is busy plucking the feathers from the chicken.
zh: 玛丽正忙着给鸡拔毛呢。

en: Are we there yet?
zh: 还没到吗？

en: Did you get a haircut?
zh: 你剪头发了？

en: Did you make the train?
zh: 你赶上火车了吗？

en: Do you know why?
zh: 你知道为什么吗？

en: Do you think Mary is cute?
zh: 你觉得玛丽可爱吗？

en: How can you tell?
zh: 你是怎么看出来的？

en: How's it going at school?
zh: 学校里怎么样？

en: I have no choice but to accept your proposals.
zh: 我只能接受你的提议了。

en: Is my time up?
zh: 我的时间到了吗？

en: Is this about me?
zh: 这是关于我的吗？

en: It was time for a change.
zh: 是时候做出改变了。

en: It'll take you days to finish this job.
zh: 完工得花好几天时间。

en: Just take it slow.
zh: 慢慢来。

en: Just take your time.
zh: 别着急，慢慢来。

en: No one is going to understand you.
zh: 没人会理解你的。

en: Tom is up next.
zh: 接下来该汤姆了。

en: Tom, can you take over?
zh: 汤姆，你能接手吗？

en: What are you up to these days?
zh: 你最近在忙什么？

en: What would you say then?
zh: 那你会怎么说？

en: Why are you so surprised?
zh: 你怎么这么惊讶？

en: At least I'm older than you.
zh: 至少我比你大。

en: I don't think he knows I love you.
zh: 我觉得他不知道我爱你。

en: Of course it's a good thing when someone learning a foreign language tries to use it without fear of making mistakes, but I don't think much of people without sufficient ability producing language learning material of poor quality.
zh: 当然，学外语的人不怕犯错、敢于开口是好事，但对于那些水平不够却还要出低质量学习资料的人，我实在不怎么看得上。

en: All things considered, I think we could say that the meeting was successful and met its objectives.
zh: 综合考虑，我觉得可以说这次会议是成功的，达到了预期目标。

en: Do all of you speak Chinese?
zh: 你们都会说中文吗？

en: Do seedless watermelons exist?
zh: 有无籽西瓜吗？

en: I speak English, French and Spanish.
zh: 我会说英语、法语和西班牙语。

en: Could you write that down, please?
zh: 能麻烦你把它写下来吗？

en: Tom follows Mary on Twitter.
zh: 汤姆在推特上关注了玛丽。

en: Are you over 18?
zh: 你满18岁了吗？

en: Are you over eighteen years old?
zh: 你满十八岁了吗？

en: Once upon a time, in a place far away, lived an old man and an old lady.
zh: 从前，在遥远的地方，住着一个老爷爷和一个老奶奶。

en: I saw a squirrel this morning.
zh: 我今天早上看到了一只松鼠。

en: Tom said that he wanted to be alone, and then went up to his room.
zh: 汤姆说他想一个人待会儿，然后就上楼回房间了。

en: Please give me one 80-yen stamp.
zh: 请给我一张80日元的邮票。

en: I'd like an 80-yen stamp, please.
zh: 我想要一张80日元的邮票。

en: Did you find a job?
zh: 你找到工作了吗？

en: Tom admitted that he had stolen the bike.
zh: 汤姆承认那辆自行车是他偷的。

en: Both Tom and Mary can't speak French.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都不会说法语。

en: Neither Tom nor Mary know how to speak French.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都不会说法语。

en: Have you fitted your winter tyres?
zh: 你换好冬胎了吗？

en: Tom is filling out a job application form.
zh: 汤姆正在填写一份职位申请表。

en: Tom is filling out an application form.
zh: 汤姆正在填申请表。

en: Can he play the guitar?
zh: 他会弹吉他吗？

en: Tom leaned up against me.
zh: 汤姆靠在我身上。

en: Can I make a suggestion?
zh: 我能提个建议吗？

en: Can someone tell me why Tom is angry?
zh: 有谁能告诉我汤姆为什么生气吗？

en: Can anyone hear me?
zh: 有人能听到我说话吗？

en: Tom lit a match and then lit the candle with it.
zh: 汤姆划了根火柴，然后用它点着了蜡烛。

en: Tom lit the candle with a match.
zh: 汤姆用火柴点着了蜡烛。

en: Tom lit the candle with the match.
zh: 汤姆用那根火柴点着了蜡烛。

en: Sorry, I'm not interested.
zh: 对不起，我没兴趣。

en: Are you in?
zh: 你在吗？

en: One must not confuse "must not" with "need not".
zh: 不能把“不准”和“不必”给搞混了。

en: At Tatoeba you can also learn a lot about your own language.
zh: 在 Tatoeba，你也能学到很多关于自己母语的知识。

en: How long are you going to cling to past glory.
zh: 你还要守着过去的辉煌到什么时候？

en: Tom spread some strawberry jam on a slice of bread.
zh: 汤姆在面包片上抹了些草莓酱。

en: Didn't you know that she passed away about two years ago?
zh: 你不知道她大约两年前就去世了吗？

en: "What's wrong?" "The speakers aren't working well."
zh: “怎么了？”“音箱不太好使了。”

en: How much more money do we need?
zh: 我们还需要多少钱？

en: How much money do you have with you right now?
zh: 你现在随身带了多少钱？

en: How much money do you have on you right now?
zh: 你现在身上带了多少钱？

en: I hate travelling by subway.
zh: 我讨厌坐地铁。

en: Many migratory birds come to this pond every year in winter.
zh: 每年冬天都有很多候鸟来到这个池塘。

en: Children generally have a higher body temperature than adults.
zh: 小孩的体温通常比大人高。

en: How many people have you told?
zh: 你跟多少人说过了？

en: How much did you pay?
zh: 你付了多少钱？

en: How much longer do you think it'll be?
zh: 你觉得还要多久？

en: How much of this did you know beforehand?
zh: 这件事你事先知道多少？

en: How long did you sleep last night?
zh: 你昨晚睡了多久？

en: How many hours did you sleep last night?
zh: 你昨晚睡了几个小时？

en: What is this? This is a car.
zh: 这是什么？这是一辆车。

en: How much longer do you think it'll take?
zh: 你觉得还要花多久？

en: I've forgotten my textbook today. Would you mind sharing yours?
zh: 我今天没带课本，能和你合看一本吗？

en: This ticket is made ​​out of paper.
zh: 这张票是纸做的。

en: My book is very heavy.
zh: 我的书很重。

en: "Is it fine to change the channel?" "Mm, yeah."
zh: “换个台行吗？”“嗯，行。”

en: There were no fewer than five women standing outside, claiming to be his wife.
zh: 外面站着不下五个女人，都自称是他的老婆。

en: Let's think about next year next year.
zh: 明年的事明年再说吧。

en: A beer today or a degree tomorrow?
zh: 选今天的啤酒，还是明天的学位？

en: He gave his seat to the old man.
zh: 他把座位让给了一位老人。

en: I definitely don't know them.
zh: 我绝对不认识他们。

en: I read his book.
zh: 我看了他的书。

en: You're the reason I came.
zh: 我是为了你才来的。

en: I've never seen the Eiffel Tower of Paris.
zh: 我从没见过巴黎的埃菲尔铁塔。

en: I just finished breakfast.
zh: 我刚吃完早饭。
